attributes.action: Reveal the Truth not the Propaganda behind global warming....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The truth behind global warming is that it is a fallacy, the scientific FACTS states that human society produces a negligible amount of Carbon Dioxide, volcano's,animals and bacteria produce many thousands of times more Carbon Dioxide than humans. It also states as a fact that Carbon Dioxide does not drive the earths climate to heat up, it in fact follows it. The truth is that Global Warming is a political diversion and method to reap taxes and jump on the enviromental band wagon.It is a LIE.
